group_1.narration: The first time Yachiyo and Mifuyu visited me together@to celebrate my birthday@was the year they were both in 6th Grade.
This is going on what I heard@from the shop owner afterward, but...
In order to keep me from learning about it,@the two of them got together@at that old sweets shop, the Tomorrow Shop,@to plan out a birthday gift, apparently.

group_1.textRight: Mmn~?!
[chara:110204:effect_shake]Mmmmn---!!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:110203:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]W-What?!  What's the matter?

group_1.textRight: This stuff is popping and crackling in my mouth, it huurts~!

group_1.textLeft: That's just the kind of candy it is.
Once the candy starts dissolving, it'll stop hurting.
...Never mind that!
Right now we're here to talk about Grandma's@birthday gift!

group_1.textRight: (ah), Yes, I'm listening...!
Umm... Well, since it's a gift for an elderly person,@how about a kimono or a ring?

group_1.textLeft: We could never afford that with our own money, though...

group_1.textRight: Huh, really?!

group_1.textLeft: Jeez... You really do think like a wealthy lady...

group_1.textRight: No, I do not.

group_1.textLeft: You do.

group_1.textRight: Mmh...
...Do you have any ideas, Yacchan?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...
She cooks meals for the girls at the boarding house.
Perhaps she could get some use out of a new set of cookware.

group_1.textRight: But...for a birthday present, that doesn't feel very special...

group_1.textLeft: Special, you say...?

group_1.textRight: It's her birthday, so...@That's why we have to get something special!

group_1.textLeft: For instance...?@[chara:110203:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:110203:cheek_0][chara:110203:face_mtn_ex_000.exp.json][chara:110203:lipSynch_1]Ah, aside from a kimono or a ring.

group_1.textRight: I-I understand that.
Umm...
How about a plushie of a sheep...?!

group_1.textLeft: Plushie...?

group_1.textRight: The other day, I saw a really cute one at the general store in front of the station.
Surely, I think your grandma would love to hug it@when she goes to sleep.

group_1.textLeft: ...Isn't that just something you want?

group_1.textRight: Auu... I'm sorry...

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, as far as something that Grandma could@use for herself, though...
It's not a bad idea, I suppose...

group_1.textRight: Oh, you're out and about again, eh?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, it's the lady who owns the shop.

group_1.textRight: If you two plan on fightin' outside my store...
Then maybe you could buy a little somethin'?@Call it a venue fee.

group_1.textLeft: We aren't fighting...!
We're looking for a birthday present for Yachiyo's grandma, so...
The two of us were just talking about that...

group_1.textRight: Is that right?

group_1.textLeft: Ah... What do you think would be a good gift,@Ma'am?

group_1.textRight: Well, it won't do you much good to ask me.
You're the ones who usually hang around@Mrs. Nanami.
You would know what she likes, and what she might get some use out of, better than I would.

group_1.textLeft: Uu... forgive me...
We started thinking of so many ideas that we@got a bit carried away...

group_1.textRight: Are you thinkin' about what would make her happy@to get from you?

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure that Grandma would be happy with@whatever we gave her...

group_1.textRight: That's one way to look at it.
Though, a present picked out by someone who@knows me on a normal day...
...would make me pretty happy, I reckon.

group_1.textLeft: ...What I know from seeing Grandma on normal@days... The things she likes...
Ah, photos...?

group_1.textRight: Does your grandma like photographs?

group_1.textLeft: I never heard it from her directly, but I have noticed@her looking at old photo albums a lot...

group_1.textRight: We should be able to buy a photo album with our allowance, right...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... then it's decided!
Thank you, Miss Store Owner!

group_1.textRight: You can thank me by buyin' a couple sodas@on your way out.
